Wednesday, April 5, 2006

Running your app from the console

Posted by marcel

Rails 1.1 lets you run your app right from the console by exposing the new Integration Testing framework.

Mike Clark, of Pragmatic Studio and the upcoming Production Rails fame, has once again offered up a quick how to. This time about Running your Rails App Headless.
